meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kasey Berry Micah Morken Chris Stansfield Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4447.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Kasey Berry, a wife and mother from Covington, Louisiana
Micah Morken, a graduate student originally from St. Paul, Minnesota
Chris Stansfield, a bartender from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,400)

tr.td: RIVERS
ALPHABETIC HOMOPHONES
A LUMPY CATEGORY
NOVEL TEASE
PRISONS
CELL BLOCK CINEMA
